website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for the fun of a tire swing with a modern twist, this spider web swing offers a lot of fun and an easy install.
pros: Large diameter is big enough for more than one kid to enjoy
Has a "donut hole" like a regular tire swing
Rated to hold up to 250 pounds
Lays flat for easy winter storage
Comfortable and easy for kids to use in many positions
cons: The perimeter of this swing is covered with a soft rubber foam that is not as sturdy as the traditional rubber of a tire swing

customer_reviews.title: Excellent swing! I bought it with the swivel hanging ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent swing! I bought it with the swivel hanging strap and hung it from a limb on our large tree. My kids and the neighbors kids love swinging, spinning, and hanging out on it. There has been a few warm summer evenings that I have laid on it myself to relax and swing. :) We keep it in the garage when not in use and its put up for winter. We had no problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Funkyfivemama

customer_reviews.title: This is a really cool swing but I just don't think the company thought ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cool swing but I just don't think the company thought it through very well when it came to the outside end knots. They are very sharp and they're all over the swing and both of our sons have gotten badly scratched up on their legs. I tried pushing them this afternoon and thought my fingers got sliced twice but it didn't break the skin, it just felt like it! OUCH!!!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Rudametkin

customer_reviews.title: Not fun
customer_reviews.text: Practically, this is two small for two kids that are larger than toddler size. The cutout in the middle does not make it comfortable for a single kid to swing by themselves. My kids never use it even though they both live more traditional swing setups.
customer_reviews.author: SavvyLady

customer_reviews.title: An upgrade to the traditional tire swing!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this swing. It's large enough for both of them to play on it at the same time, and sturdy enough that I dont worry about it. I have no complaints, but I would offer the manufacturer the following suggestion. While the ropes are sturdy and smooth to the touch for the most part, it would be a lot more comfortable for young chilldren if there was some kind of padding or foam on the ropes. After a while it seems to bother the hands from holding on so tight. I'll probably end up wrapping them with some type of foam tape.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ferruzzi

customer_reviews.title: Great swing, great buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great swing and we love it! I'd buy it again in a heartbeat. I used a tree strap to add length and for easy installation on the branch. It's the new tire swing 2.0! My boys (3, 5 & 7) could spend hours on the swing, they love it so much. The package arrived on time was easy to assemble, and we've been satisfied with it ever since. Thanks Swinging Monkey for an awesome memory making swing!!
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Fun Swing - Requires Pushing Help
customer_reviews.text: The product is sturdy and I feel safe with my child on it. She spent 4 hours on the swing the first day it was installed. We purchased an A frame separately to put it on and there are two straps for this swing, so I don't see how a swivel could work if putting it on an A frame. A swivel might work if hanging from a tree. My daughter and her friend love swinging together on this swing. The biggest downside for me is that they always want someone to push them. That is my reason for giving 4 stars instead of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Ricasuave78

customer_reviews.title: Requires hearing protection
customer_reviews.text: Installed as a 25 foot tree swing in a large oak on a hill for an Easter surprise for my grandkids. The two year old was not happy with it partly due to just me and him trying it out and there being no good way to climb on or swing while holding him. My real complaint however is the need for hearing protection due to the laughter and screams of delight from the three older kids (KG thru 2nd grade).😉
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: My 2 grandkids love the swing
customer_reviews.text: My 2 grandkids love the swing! They spend hours playing on it. Their neighbor came over with her 3 year old and they all played on it! She also liked it so much that her Mother ordered the same swing! Love the hole in the center and the foam around the outside. It is very kid friendly. Not scratchy on their skin. Dad also got on swing and played on it the kids! Just great family fun!
customer_reviews.author: happy camper

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!  Very sturdy and kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, seems sturdy, kids love it and parents do too. Not quite enough diameter for me to lay comfortably across, but I still enjoy laying in it and swinging, it is comfy enough. no squeaks or sounds when my wife and I are on it. It is a bit tight getting it together, takes some muscle, but results in a sturdy final product.
customer_reviews.author: Big6ft6

customer_reviews.title: Awesome swing!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness, I couldn’t recommend this swing enough! My kids absolutely love it and it’s safe and well made. We’ve had for about a year now and it’s not even faded one bit!
customer_reviews.author: Libby Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: The only issue is the black foam around the outside of the circle cracked and came apart in just a few uses. Other than that this is an awesome swing! The kids have a blast on it and love being able to fit more than one at a time!
customer_reviews.author: Jinny Brinson

customer_reviews.title: We all love it!
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren had grown tired of the tire swing in our back yard and had retreated to the video games in our family room! When the Monkey went up they headed back to the yard! Yeah!!! We all love it!
customer_reviews.author: Pat M.

customer_reviews.title: This swing is truly excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: This swing is truly excellent!!! We received it on time and well-packaged. We were pleased with the quality and how heavy-duty it is; it was beyond our expectations. My husband and I put it together in no time and delivered and installed for the grandchildren last night. They LOVE it! Our four-year old twins had the best time together. Their eight year old brother had a blast with it too! It was a joy to see and I am grateful to know they will all get years of enjoyment with this terrific swing. Excellent job, Swinging Monkey! A+++
customer_reviews.author: Nanashopper

customer_reviews.title: Best swing we have had. Tweens like it too
customer_reviews.text: This swing is terrific. It is strong, allows two (or more if they are small) kids to sit on it together, and the hole in the middle allows bigger kids to get in easily. My tweens and teens love it. I've already had several people ask me where I got it.
customer_reviews.author: AnotherDay

customer_reviews.title: long and hard as they did when they were swinging on this awesome swing! It was just what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: I don't believe I have ever seen my grandkids laugh so loud, long and hard as they did when they were swinging on this awesome swing! It was just what we wanted. Great that it fits several kids at a time, so they can swing together and not have to wait and take turns. I like that the netting platform is strong, comfortable and makes a safe seat. Well made. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: clf13

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases of the year. Very easy to install, although getting the right height was a bit of a science. Kids play on it for hours. Have had several parties since hanging and everyone comments on how great it is. Make sure you have a branch that can take the swinging.
customer_reviews.author: David Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Summer swing!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our just turned 7 yr old and 12 yr old to swing on together and they've used it every day since we hung it up! My husband bought the easy hang swing strap but we also had to attach some chain for it to hang low enough for them to use. Seems very sturdy so far and my kids absolutely love hanging out in it. It's actually like built-in therapy for them & is very relaxing! No one's fallen off yet! We did choose a very thick sturdy live oak branch for it to hang on.
customer_reviews.author: crazy mama

customer_reviews.title: Very easy length/leveling adjustment in the rings
customer_reviews.text: Can't keep the neighborhood kids off of it. Very easy length/leveling adjustment in the rings. You can clip them both through a single carabiner for single-point mounting, and I recommend a swivel so the ropes don't get twisted (storing energy that could be released in an unpredictable untwist).
customer_reviews.author: a2020

customer_reviews.title: ... with their swing set are hard plastic and not comfortable or easy to stay in
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for our grandchildren since the swings that came with their swing set are hard plastic and not comfortable or easy to stay in. The swing was easy to hang from a large tree branch and looks like it could even hold a senior citizen (me) who loves to swing like she did when she was young. The grandchildren have not come over to try it out yet, but I know it will be a big hit.
customer_reviews.author: Pyrma

customer_reviews.title: Such an awesome fun swing for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: Such an awesome fun swing for the whole family. Can easily fit a few kids or one adult and a child. Swing goes way higher then a normal swng and my son and I have an a blast playing on it. This replaced a tire swing which ended up being such a great replacement. It's hanging on a tall branch on a tree and it's just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great swing but needs reinforcement  for safety.
customer_reviews.text: We love the swing, but want other parents/buyers to know that the rings can bend and we recommend using a back up hardware. Luckily my husband had installed additional hardware, if not, our son could have potentially been hurt by falling.
customer_reviews.author: Anna R. Damon

customer_reviews.title: and nicely packaged. Putting it together was a little frustrating ...
customer_reviews.text: We got this swing very quickly, and nicely packaged. Putting it together was a little frustrating until i got help. Really easy with 2 people. My 20 month old loves it. She doesn't want to get off. I can see her using this for many years
customer_reviews.author: rise hatten

customer_reviews.title: Fun for All ages!!!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived just as promised! Looking forward to trying it out with the kids once we get it hung from a suitable branch. I think the kids are going to love it! We like the fact that more than one can swing at a time, and that we don't have to have a big swing set in the yard to accommodate the swing...just a pretty tree! Days later....our grandchildren were absolutely delighted with their new swing, the tarzan tire! It provides such fun and its entertainment is endless! A GREAT buy! LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl A. Erdel

customer_reviews.title: It is fun for one child or many at a time
customer_reviews.text: I bought this swing to replace a traditional tire swing, which I felt was dangerous, because it was so heavy. This swing is light, colorful and very well built. Even though it is lightweight it is not flimsy by any means. I expect it to last for years. Our grandkids from age 2-10 have a blast on it. It is fun for one child or many at a time. For me it is the perfect alternative to a tire swing and easier for kids to get on and off of...and very safe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Two adults needed to assemble swing.
customer_reviews.text: Our kids love the swing and spend a lot of time on it - alone or together. In order to assemble the swing two adults are needed as the holes for the screws are somewhat “hidden” underneath the rubber ring and it takes some strong adult hands to pull the rubber to the side while another adult is tightening the screws. Please note that additional ropes are needed if you want to attach the swing to a tree and not a swing set.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Bolt stripped
customer_reviews.text: One of the bolts got completely stripped before I even hung it. My daughter was really excited about this swing, so I guess I'll reorder it, but I am concerned it's not as sturdy/safe as it should be.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Hellsund

customer_reviews.title: Causes too much dizziness!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great hanging from the tree. Very strong! However, the children got nauseated and sick, young and old due to the unending swirling factor. Wish we could find a swing that just swings!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy H. Estes

customer_reviews.title: My kids absolutely love this product
customer_reviews.text: My kids absolutely love this product. It was easy to assemble and install with the aid of a hanging strap. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars was the nylon rope used in the webbing. While it doesn't bother the kids, the ends through the frame are sharp and have left scratches on adults and kids pushing the swing. It's easy enough to avoid when you know what to look for though. Would definitely recommend to friends.
customer_reviews.author: G. Fisbeck

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice "Tire" Swing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my kids. They love it. Hung it from a 30 foot branch and it can go very, very high the way I set it up. The nylon roping inside and foot hole in the middle let me feel that they are still safe and can really hang on. Only minor issue so far is the nice soft padding around the outside ring is getting tore up when the kids push themselves against the tree (kids!). I will likely just tape up anywhere it rips off. The swing is a very nice size and easily holds 2-3 kids depending on the branch size you attached it to and their weight.
customer_reviews.author: btest2

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the family!
customer_reviews.text: This is so much fun! My 3 year old had a blast, and I was able to climb into this thing and swing with him. I'm not very big, so I don't know if I would suggest that the dads jump into this thing, but it can handle some weight! Excellent purchase, very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Dena

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived without the hanging straps and bolts. Useless. This swing has three parts. How hard is it to make sure they're all present? Way to mess up the Christmas present for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tree swing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tree swing! My 7 year old loves it. She could fit two friends on it with her but also swings by herself perfectly fine. Very sturdy! Easy to put together! Recommended for sure!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jesika Hinkley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super duper fun for my 5 y/o and 2 y/o, would buy it again!! Fit perfect with the tree and super unique. Everybody who seen it at our back yard asked where I got it from. They said they have never seen anything like this before. My 2 y/o girl just loves being on it. Strong recommendation!!
customer_reviews.author: A&a

customer_reviews.title: Good swing!
customer_reviews.text: The product is good quality and the kids are enjoying it! My only complaint is that it is awkward and hard to balance for one kid to swing alone.
customer_reviews.author: Allison McNamara

customer_reviews.title: Grandmonsters Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Wife purchased, assembled and installed it all by herself. Study enough to easily suspend all three Grandmonsters ages 3, 4 and 6!
customer_reviews.author: Darren is me name.

customer_reviews.title: Fun swing
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids love it. No issues installing or putting it together. You do need to purchase a tree swing strap.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Quality Swing
customer_reviews.text: This swing is easy to put together, sturdy and extremely well-made. Purchased the swing about a month ago and the kids have already spent many, many hours playing on it.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: It easily fits four kids (ages 3 - 7) so everyone ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an expensive tree swing, but my kids are loving it! It easily fits four kids (ages 3 - 7) so everyone can be part of the fun. My kids enjoy the pushing as much as the swinging so it keeps them all busy. This is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Brian M.

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this!
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME! my kids and wife love this thing! Great solid construction. Metal tubing under pipe wrap padding nylon rope well knotted. So much better than a tire swing. Both my kids and wife fit on this at the same time. we added a swivel connector to take tension of the rope.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great investment. Solid product. It's the staple of my backyard
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: ... this swing for my grandkids and wow do they love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this swing for my grandkids and wow do they love it!.. it goes pretty high!. Very hot in Fl right now, but the heat has not deter them because them..they are enjoying it alot! Great buy :).
customer_reviews.author: plummie59

customer_reviews.title: Tough First Impression
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a chance to set it up yet, but it looks to be well made. I gave it as a Christmas gift to my grandchildren, and I was a little disappointed that it arrived without any packaging, information or branding at all. It simply came unassembled in a rather beaten Fed Ex box. I'm sure it will be a hit once I can assemble it at their house, but the initial presentation was unexcitingly modest.
customer_reviews.author: Wes C.

customer_reviews.title: A little stretched out after just a few days.
customer_reviews.text: My kids are obsessed with this swing. My only complaint is that the webbing is stretching after just a few days of swinging. It was a breeze to construct and hang though.
customer_reviews.author: A. Powell

customer_reviews.title: great so far
customer_reviews.text: Hasn't been up long, great so far. I'm still concerned about long-term outside exposure.
customer_reviews.author: R. Leibforth

customer_reviews.title: Swing is great! We experienced a little difficulty working the metal ...
customer_reviews.text: Swing is great! We experienced a little difficulty working the metal bolts through the rim, but hanging was easy!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne glessner

customer_reviews.title: Our monkeys like it!
customer_reviews.text: This is fun and safe. I wish they had given better instruction with the strap on the tree ( sold separately) you need to wrap it so the strap doesn't swing. It wears away the tree bark. They also tell you not to let kids swing empty. Good advice, enough so that they should add a warning label in the swing. Kids climb around like monkeys and spin and swing. A good find!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Kottmeier

customer_reviews.title: Safety and the fact that the kids or looking at each other while swinging.
customer_reviews.text: I received it fast it was easy to put together and the kids love it l couldn’t ask for a better swing 3or 4 young kids can ride together and it is a very safe swing thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Swing
customer_reviews.text: Awesome swing! My 6 year old and his friends love it. I have also enjoyed swinging with my son on it. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Great SWing
customer_reviews.text: A little expensive but once we received and installed it I knew why. Our grand kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Roll Man

customer_reviews.title: What a great idea if you can only put one swing up
customer_reviews.text: This swing is the talk of neighborhood! Everyone loves it. What a great idea if you can only put one swing up. Both of my nephews can be on it at the same time (no fighting) and they love it! I put it in our front yard tree with a chain and a free spinner. Works just fine with only one kid in it as well. Wish they made an adult sized one :)
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Great swing
customer_reviews.text: Terrific swing. The grandkids loved it. The only complaint I haves one of the holes in the metal tubing was not punched out so took a little work to get that done and at the assembly completed.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Kunz

customer_reviews.title: Great for grandchildren
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids love it. I don't have to push the 4 year old. He can get off and on and have fun. Older grandsons are thrilled with it.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 3 yr old twins
customer_reviews.text: Great for my 3 yr old twins. Sturdy, easy to put together. Purchased with this strap to hang its great: #1 EXTRA LONG SWING STRAP (10Ft)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great swing
customer_reviews.text: My 4 and 2 year old grandsons are thrilled with the swing. It seems very sturdy and will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Lady

customer_reviews.title: Great Swing!
customer_reviews.text: Great swing! The kids love it! We added the spinner and the kids were dizzy all day!
customer_reviews.author: JamieD

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Swing
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren absolutely love this swing. It was easy to install and about the right size. Construction was straightforward and no tools we required.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product!! Sturdy!!! Large!! and the kids love it. Highly recommended. Easy assembly as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So much fun. We bought a tree strap
customer_reviews.text: So much fun. We bought a tree strap, and a swivel spinner with hooks to go with the swing.
customer_reviews.author: Ksaj

customer_reviews.title: This swing is awesome. Myself with my 10 and 5 year old ...
customer_reviews.text: This swing is awesome. Myself with my 10 and 5 year old all fit comfortably on it. Seems very sturdy. My kids are enjoying it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Easy to assemble, adjust, and use. My kids and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Bug mumma

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to tire swing.
customer_reviews.text: Great alternative to a tire swing. I purchased a spinner connector along with it. Spins like crazy. Large enough for several big kids. High quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: suhansen1

customer_reviews.title: Very easy installation.
customer_reviews.text: The kids ❤️ it. It should say enough about the product. Very easy installation .
customer_reviews.author: K.

customer_reviews.title: Installation was easy. The hardest part was finding a good branch ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this swing as an end of the school year surprise for our kids. We purchased a strap and rotational device to go along with it. Installation was easy. The hardest part was finding a good branch to hang it from. I highly recommend having that figured out before you buy the swing. So far my kids love it and have used it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the swing
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put up. Light weight. Swings high. My 4 year old loved it
customer_reviews.author: Jacquie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: 3 Year old twins love it. Wish the center hole diameter was a few inches smaller.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect -- great design and quality. the kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: almost a year
customer_reviews.text: Not quite a year and very happy. Kids love it. Holding up well for 2 and 5yr old.
customer_reviews.author: contractor

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Huge! Two of my kids fit on it at the same time! Even an adult can ride on it! Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The swing seems pretty sturdy and is really fun our 3 kids of ...
customer_reviews.text: The swing seems pretty sturdy and is really fun our 3 kids of various ages. The only thing I worry is about is the soft black perimeter around the swing. It has already gotten nicked, and I worry that it could rip eventually.
customer_reviews.author: ArghMo

customer_reviews.title: Happy kids, happy parents!
customer_reviews.text: We put this up a few days ago, and my kids have played on it every day since. We love it because it's big enough for our three kids to fit (ages 12, 10, and 7) at the same time or alone. So, it cuts down on arguing :)
customer_reviews.author: J. Zach

customer_reviews.title: A terrific swing. Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: A terrific swing. Very sturdy, easy to install, the children in my family love it. The rubber ring circumference provides some cushioning safety. I am very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: liny

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks like it couldn't hold much weight, BUT DOES! It's more turquoise than green though!
customer_reviews.author: Jigs

customer_reviews.title: Awesome swing for kids!
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids are in Heaven now at my home! love love this swing because the kids can put their legs in the center hole!
customer_reviews.author: Val Mic

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic fun hanging from our backyard tree. Been up for a week now and the kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Seattle Mama

customer_reviews.title: The grandkids just love this swing
customer_reviews.text: The grandkids just love this swing. Nice because more that one can ride at a time. I love the feature of the outside being wrapped in a foam rubber for safety reasons. Great Swing!!!
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Kusmierz

customer_reviews.title: Swing is great fun. My granddaughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Swing is great fun. My granddaughter loves it. However, two pieces of rope on the swing have broken. They have been tied together. Don't know how long they will last. Shouldn't have happened. This wasn't an inexpensive swing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and fun
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her swing. There are so many different ways to use it! It works for one child or several.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Connelly

customer_reviews.title: He has a older brother and a younger sister and they love it too
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our grandson. And he loves it. He has a older brother and a younger sister and they love it too. We're considering purchasing another one cause there always arguing on who gets on it first. Best swing ever
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our grandchildren love it!
customer_reviews.text: We have 4 little ones and were looking for an activity they could all do together. This swing is perfect. It's sturdy and lots of fun, a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Grand kids really enjoyed it. A business suggestion for you
customer_reviews.text: Grand kids really enjoyed it. A business suggestion for you. I had to buy from two more places to get the hanging stuff i needed to install the swing. Maybe you should offer that too. Or partner with Rhino - they were very responsive.
customer_reviews.author: TGS

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. It's good for him to use his ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 5 year old grandson and he loves it. Great quality. It's good for him to use his legs to help it move. I know he will enjoy it for years! We have a 15 year old who will enjoy it too once we find a stronger tree limb.
customer_reviews.author: DWB

customer_reviews.title: Great swing for the whole family!
customer_reviews.text: The whole family loves this swing! For my rambunctious eight and six-year-old sons, they can spin themselves silly and rock high to get their energy out. Both of them can sit on it at the same time, so there is no fighting. I can relax on it, like a hammock, and stare up at the beautiful blue sky.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for grandchildren. Easy to assemble. Versatile. Can easily be hung on tree or swing set. Children love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Love love love!!! This swing is very durable all my kids piled on and it held great! Would buy again! no problems with shipping it was fast and product was easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Delinda Bate

customer_reviews.title: Love love the product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of the tree swings, one for each set of grandchildren. From the moment it was received and easily installed, the kids have had hours and hours of fun. They love to swing and spin on the swing. It's heartwarming to see them having so much fun...the squeals and smiles just keep coming. Definitely a truly great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to assemble and appears to be sturdy and safe
customer_reviews.text: My 9 and 7 year old boys were thrilled with this swing and I suspect they will get a lot of use out of it. It was easy to assemble and appears to be sturdy and safe. Just make sure that you order the relevant attachment that you need to hang it up in order to avoid disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great swing and great price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome swing I love it is much as my daughter
customer_reviews.author: Jane Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: Installed it yesterday without much trouble. Kids love it, just hoping that it survives the elements, but I've got it set up so I can take it down over the rotten weather months. Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great product!
customer_reviews.text: Used this product to hang a tree swing for grandchildren.

customer_reviews.title: better than the tire she had prior

customer_reviews.title: ... run an after school homework center and the kids love their new toy
customer_reviews.text: I run an after school homework center and the kids love their new toy. Easily 3 elementary age medium size kids can get in it and swing. Very fun!

customer_reviews.title: My kids LOVE this. They swing on it almost every day
customer_reviews.text: My kids LOVE this. They swing on it almost every day. However, the shipping was really delayed and I payed extra for rushed shipping. I can't imagine how long it would take without paying extra.

customer_reviews.text: This swing is great! My 5 year old grand daughter absolutely loves it!! I would definitely suggest this swing!!

customer_reviews.title: Fun swing!
customer_reviews.text: Our 3 and 5 year old boys love this swing. We put ours under our deck so they can play on hot afternoons. Highly recommend!

customer_reviews.text: This made our daughters very happy! They can both swing at the same time.

customer_reviews.title: Swing outlasted the tree!
customer_reviews.text: Well made product. Wish we could have tried it longer but our tree fell down. Bummer. :-) But the swing did certainly outlast the tree!

product_meta.title: Tarzan Tire 40" Spider Web Swing, Green – Tree Swing, Redesigned Tire Swing, Extra Safe and Durable, Swing with Friends, Easy Install for Swing Set or Tree
feature_bullets: NON-STOP FUN: For an all new and redesigned take on the traditional tire swing check out our Tarzan Tire Spider Web Swing! Featuring a 40" (inch) diameter this swing is large enough for multiple children to swing and play together!
SAFE AND DURABLE: Highest quality and adheres to strict safety requirements with quality engineering including a padded steel frame and super strong nylon webbing, this swing is built to last!

SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: Swinging Monkey Products stands behind all our products and all our products come with an automatic one year warranty. We offer top notch customer service and will always be there for our customers.

EASY TO INSTALL AND REMOVE FOR STORAGE: Swings ships in compact package and can be assembled in minutes! The swing is designed to work universally and easily attaches to swing set or hang from a tree!
PERFECT GIFT: Check out all the great products from Swinging Monkey Products for the perfect gift for your family!
